features: 🚕【1080P Full HD Dash Cam】2022 Newest Dash cam recording with Super High Resolution 1080P@30fps Full HD Lens, providing outstanding image quality with a broader field of vision. 3 inch Super large IPS Display that can shows the real-time image,helps you see every details as clear as possible when playing back. Dash camera automatically recording when you start engine,you will always under protection.

🚕【Ultra HD Night Vision Dash Camera】The combination of F1.8 large aperture, WDR, HDR ensures the clarity of images at night. Car camera makes night shots brighter and prevents overexposure under strong light, obtains crystal-clear recording. Eliminates the need for an auxiliary light source even in low-light environments, making it easy to obtain sharp, color-accurate images.

🚕【170° Wide Angle Dash Cam for Cars with 6G Lens】Adopt upgraded sensor, 6 glass lens, F1.8 big aperture and real 170 degree wide field of view, the dash cam reduces the blind spots and captures more details, to reserve the real scene. High-performance chipset plus the powerful processor which enables you to take up to 1080P 30fps full HD videos and 12MP pictures.

🚕【Powerful Dash Cam with Multi-functions】This car dash camera equipped with G-sensor that saves video evidence of collisions;Loop Recording that automatically overwrites the unprotected files; Motion Detection, will automatically start recording when detects the movement of objects. Superior Night Vision, Parking Monitoring,WDR, Date Stamp, License Plate Stamp.Provides you with multi-scene requirement and a safe driving experience.

🚕【Easy to Use with 32G SD Card & Worry-Free Guarantee】This dash camera is straight forward to install and operate. The included suction mount could be easily attached anywhere on your windshield in seconds, and connect to the power supply(the 32G SD card has already inserted into the dash cam). The dashboard camera will auto record immediately when car engine on.You will get lifetime after-sales support with BOOGIIO customer care support team, 7x24 hours technical support.
body.description: BOOGIIO Dash Cam Front with 32G Micro SD Card Capture Clearer Videos and Pictures Warm Tips: 1.The internal battery has a small capacity and is intended for backup power only. Please plug the dash cam via the provided car charger while use it. 2.Please adjust the sensitivity of G-sensor to Low or turn it off if your monitor shows"card full" even with loop recording function open of this dash cam. 3.In order to ensure seamless recording, please turn off the "motion detection" function when driving. 4.Choose Class 10 MicroSD card UP to 32GB(INCLUDED), format it before use. 32G MicroSD Card Included (Installed) 3 inch IPS Display Screen Full HD 1080P Resolution Super Night Vision & G-Sensor F1.8 Big Aperture & Advanced Sensor Seamless Loop recording & Motion detection WDR technology & 24Hours Parking monitor

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Newest Dash Cam in 2022: BOOGIIO OK-831 with 32G Micro SD Card - Constant Protection for Driving ! Looking for the best dash cam you can buy? We’ve comprehensively tested each of in-car cameras. So whether you want added peace of mind while you drive, lower insurance premiums or the option to share motoring moments to your YouTube channel, you’ll find your ideal with BOOGIIO OK-831 Dash Cam. Dash cams make motoring safer. Mounted behind your windscreen, they record what’s happening around you while you drive. Hopefully the most they’ll ever capture is a minor traffic mishap – or a stunning vista while you’re on a road trip. But should the worst happen, they can also provide invaluable evidence in the event of an accident or insurance claim. And with more people back on the road after lockdown. BOOGIIO OK-831 dash camera is more likely to have advanced features, from New alloy material to G-force sensors: ✔️More Stable and Reliable: Stable performance thanks to advanced processor, powerful sensor, 6 glass lens and other features, longer lifespan high end dash cam than other cheaper dash cams. ✔️Better Night Vision: The main part of this camera that stands out from the competition is the infrared night vision. While other cameras claim to have night vision, but BOOGIIO dash camera can provide clear footage even with no lighting. ✔️Strict quality control and have a professional QC team, with CE, FCC & RoHS certificated. We provide you with excellent video sharpness and remarkable product quality at an unbelievably good value. recording your wonderful trips and ensuring your driving safe and joyful.

BOOGIIO is customer focus, provide advanced and powerful dash cam,providing clear video, enjoy your wonderful trips and ensuring your driving safe. What's in the Box? 1 x 1080P Front Dash Camera 1 x 32GB Micro SD Card (Installed) 1 x USB Card Reader 1 x Car Charger 1 x Suction Mount 1 x User Manual Note: User manual has steps to steps installation. Please look up to user manual. BOOGIIO Dash Cam Front with 32G Micro SD Card Capture Clearer Videos and Pictures Warm Tips: 1.The internal battery has a small capacity and is intended for backup power only. Please plug the dash cam via the provided car charger while use it. 2.Please adjust the sensitivity of G-sensor to Low or turn it off if your monitor shows"card full" even with loop recording function open of this dash cam. 3.In order to ensure seamless recording, please turn off the "motion detection" function when driving. 4.Choose Class 10 MicroSD card UP to 32GB(INCLUDED), format it before use. 32G MicroSD Card Included (Installed) 3 inch IPS Display Screen Full HD 1080P Resolution Super Night Vision & G-Sensor F1.8 Big Aperture & Advanced Sensor Seamless Loop recording & Motion detection WDR technology & 24Hours Parking monitor

3 Inch 1080P Full HD IPS Screen BOOGIIO dash camera Comes with 3 inches high definition screen and updated FHD 1080P resolution can be intuitive to watch all the things happening at any time and place, but also helps you clearly see every details when playing back and providing you the best visual experience. Superior Night Vision With the WDR and super night vision technology, Our dashboard camera captures every vivid moments such as license plates and road signs clearly even at night. F/1.8 largest aperture available , 6-glass wide angle lens and high sensitivity image sensor ensure better image quality and more natural details when driving at night. 170° Ultra-wide Field of View Full HD 1080P@30fps (1920x1080) with the 170 degrees angle,wide field of view reduces the blind spots and captures more details, record of every driving moment. It can maximize the safety protection of you and your car.

24 Hours Loop Recording This dash camera for cars with loop recording function. Continuously record small video files of a length which is determined by the settings of 1/ 3/ 5 Mins. Automatically overwrites the oldest file to save the current file when the memory card is full. Infinite loop recording, never miss any moment. You don't worry about SD card getting full to stop recording. G-sensor Emergency Lock Built in sensitive G-sensor, the current footage video will be locked and protected in the Micro SD card when the G-Sensor is triggered by sudden shake shake/collision. As evidence, videos before accident is most important. Your safety and legal rights are always under protection. 24 hours Parking Monitor The car recorder includes Motion Detection and Parking Monitoring. It automatically starts recording a 15-second-video when it detects a collision or shakes, providing you with security every moment. Long time parking function needs hardwire kit. Easy Installation The front dash cam is really easy to install. You can simple mount front camera on the car windshield with the included suction mount. It can be hidden behind the rear view mirror and will not distract the driver's attention.The dash camera doesn't require any exhausting methods to install, Even novice can install quickly and use it well within seconds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was worried it wouldn't be a good purchase but overall it is so nice to have. The quality of the camera as well as the video is really nice. It gives me some peace of mind knowing if I were to get into an accident, I have video evidence. I liked it so much I got my husband one too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Versatile, High Quality Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: Very Surprising Camera. First off, the suction of the window holder is top notch. It has survived sitting on a hot windshield for hours and not a once did it fall, or even seem loose. Major plus for me since I have had GPS devices that fall over and over again installed in that manner.As for the camera itself, video quality is pretty good. It's pretty clear and shows a great picture at night as well. Videos are loop recorded, and you can save a video manually if you want, or stop recording with the push of a button. It also records audio.The box comes with a full set of instructions that actually explain what each button does, as well as accessories such as MicroSD card reader USB Adapter to view the videos you record. A 32 GB Micro SD card is also included, but you can use a larger card if you choose. The Camera supports constant recording if installed to an always-on Power supply, so you can record video even when not around your vehicle. Would work great for those hit and run situations.In conclusion, this is a very well built, High Quality Dash Cam, and can easily be used in personal, or fleet service. For the asking price, the quality can't be beat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent camera for the money
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the money. Easy to install and get running. The video is a little choppy but not bad at all. Well within reasonable expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality product
reviews.reviewText: We bought this Dash Cam as a way to be safe insurance wise when we are renting a car and are very happy with it. The product is high quality and functions really well. Easy installation. Would definitely recommend to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the extra protection!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this for a few months and it is still working great! The images and videos/sound is clear and I like that it takes 2 minutes videos instead of one long one. The only problem I have is that I cannot figure out how to get a video off the camera and onto something else if I needed too. Otherwise, this is a great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's a good dashcam for $39
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for your first dashcam and have knowledge with navigating through multiple menus on a 3" screen then this may be a good choice to see if a dashcam will be beneficial. Here are the Cons. Con #1- A 32gb micro SD is to small. With limiting you at a 32 max you won't be able to record a complete day of AVI files. You'll want to bring a couple more cards with you to swap out during your trip. Con #2- it saves files in AVI and my Chromebook I keep with me wouldn't open the files. You will need to install an app to covert them to a jpg or MV4 before being viewed. Con #3- It's not easy to navigate through the menu options and if you have thick fingers you'll have the tendency to push the wrong button. Con #4- Once you have it mounted onto your glass it's difficult to change menu settings and remove the SD card. Pro #1- For entry level it works. $39 with card is a pretty good deal. When you upgrade to another camera keep it as a backup or put in your kids car. (They'll love you for it 😂) Pro #2- it has a metal case and unlike my previous plastic one it hasn't split in half yet and spewed it guts all over the dash when the suction cup decides it time to let go. Pro#3- it works and it cheap

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfectly satisfied with this little camera. I installed it I’m my rear SUV window images are very bright and SD card provided clear images utilizing my computer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good dashcam
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised to find how well the dash cam worked at night. It looks almost as if it's daylight, however, when you pass cars the entire screen turns white, so the light filtering is not very good. It is also really good during the day and has high-quality video, but if the sun is in the frame, it's just a white screen. Other than the light filtering, it's a very good dashcam. Make sure it's plugged all the way into the outlet or it will randomly turn off. Buy a larger SD card because the one that comes with the camera will fill pretty quickly.

I have been used this camera for while, and it is still working as new.The quality of the image is good, even during the night, and it is very easy to install.It comes with a micro SD card and adaptor to read in your computer.So far no issues.
Easy to setup small enough without blocking the view while you drive. Clear picture or video. Come with everything you need good camera for the price.
Works like a charm. Features, performance, and price are all satisfying.

The dashcam I recently purchased has exceeded all my expectations! Its compact design seamlessly fits onto my windshield without obstructing my view. The video quality is superb, capturing crystal-clear footage both during the day and at night, ensuring I have reliable recordings of my journeys. The wide-angle lens offers an excellent field of view, capturing every detail on the road. The loop recording feature is also convenient, automatically overwriting older footage to ensure continuous recording. Its easy installation and user-friendly interface make it a breeze to operate. I feel much safer knowing this reliable dashcam provides an extra layer of security on the road. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a dependable and high-quality dashcam!
Great camera, easy to set up. So happy we bought it!
